result.arabic_text: أَمۡ حَسِبۡتَ أَنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡكَهۡفِ وَٱلرَّقِيمِ كَانُواْ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا عَجَبًا
result.translation: 9. Wonna hinnak Nabiyow gablâ maraa kee ken migooqa elle tunkuttube luc Ni-astootik cagalah dibuk cakkumuh (Qajabah) tan astay lafitak raqta makka-lin qaranwaa kee baaxô gino wohuk cakkumuh lafitak raqtak.
